text: Ri winaq ri man xekam taj rumal ri kꞌax ri xkꞌulmatajik xuqujeꞌ man xetaniꞌ taj chubꞌanik ri itzel taq jastaq, man xetaniꞌ taj chuqꞌijilaꞌxik ri itzel, ri e bꞌanom taq tyox ri e bꞌantal che qꞌana pwaq, saq pwaq, qꞌanqꞌoj chꞌichꞌ, abꞌaj, cheꞌ, we jastaq riꞌ xa e bꞌantalik kumal achyabꞌ man kekwin taj kakito, man kekaꞌy taj, man kekwin taj kebꞌinik.
